title: £DS capture cards.
body:
Ive been looking into them, as I do love to play my 3DS.
Does anyone have one of these and can tell me about them?
Or thought on them for that matter.

I can buy one right now... But uhhh I would be completely broke.
http://3dscapture.com/
http://3dscapture.com/order.html

Its about 245 USD which = 338.33 AUSD which is alot (For me anyway)
So im gonna save up for now.


But does anyone have any experiences with these? and how they work?

EDIT: sorry for the weird £ symbol, apparently I pressed some keys I never knew existed. *Its suppose to be a 3*
